divs: Sighting DetailsAt 2:30PM, my brother and I were in our back yard when we saw the UFOs. He stopped and I asked why, he said "Look! A UFO!" I looked over the mountain line where he was pointing, and saw a black, egg-shaped figure. It was round on the bottom. It was like a side-ways oval. The figure was moving slowly, moving south-west to north east. It picked up speed as it went until it dissapeared. Then I saw a inverted pie plate traveling east, slowly. It then disapeared behind a tree where I couldn't see it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Myersville
There were no other sightings in Myersville on or around May 20th 2007
Summary: 2 UFOs, 1 moving slow, the other fast. moving back and forth.
